lead_paragraph: FIFA President Gianni Infantino said he was pleased that the global soccer body's Ethics Committee has determined he had not violated the FIFA code of ethics.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Head Infantino Pleased for Getting Cleared of Unethical Conduct
headline.main: FIFA Head Infantino Pleased for Getting Cleared of Unethical Conduct

snippet: FIFA President Gianni Infantino said he was pleased that the global soccer body's Ethics Committee has determined he had not violated the FIFA code of ethics....
